text: They ’ ll be there for her! Jessie James Decker channeled her inner Rachel Green to celebrate her milestone 30th birthday on Thursday, April 12, with a Friends - themed party. James Decker — who welcomed her third child with husband Eric just ten days prior — appeared to embrace turning the big 3 - 0 surrounded by friends and family. The country crooner was all smiles and even sported a gold crown just like Green ’ s character during the Friends episode, “ The One Where They All Turn Thirty. ” And her newborn, Forrest Bradley Decker, even joined for the fun ( and a feeding! ) Scroll down to see all the epic nods to the ‘ 90s sitcom.
